epics.title: Preview & Camera Polish
epics.description: Hero section previews: cycling rybs, independent shelf preview, configurable sweep/pan animations

epics.title: Editor UX & Interactions
epics.description: Ryb selection in single editor, reset buttons, expand/collapse, gimbal/pan/zoom controls, freeform drawing improvements

epics.title: Rendering Quality
epics.description: Fix mesh shimmer artifacts, improve orthographic view zoom math, independent zoom per view

epics.title: Mobile & Responsive Layout
epics.description: Improve layout for mobile and tablet breakpoints

epics.title: Testing & Quality
epics.description: Expand Playwright test coverage for multi-ryb interpolation, UI interactions, and regression

epics.title: Export & File Output
epics.description: Implement SVG/DXF cut file generation from parametric shelf data

stories.title: Mini preview cycles through shelf rybs with fade
stories.description: Top-right mini preview should cycle through each ryb in the shelf set every N seconds with a smooth fade in/out transition. Interval and fade duration are developer-configurable.

stories.title: Shelf preview independent from Full Ryb Editor view
stories.description: The hero shelf preview and the top-right mini preview should not change when the user switches views in the Full Ryb Editor (top/front/side/3d).

stories.title: Gentle camera sweep/pan on preview canvases
stories.description: Both preview canvases (hero shelf + mini ryb) should have a subtle auto-rotating sweep whose speed and amplitude are developer-configurable.

stories.title: Fix mesh shimmer artifacts on complex freeform shapes
stories.description: Complex freeform meshes produce visual shimmer/z-fighting. Investigate normals, polygon winding, depth bias, and curve segment count. Make mesh quality params developer-configurable.

stories.title: Fix orthographic view zoom math (top/front/side)
stories.description: Top/Front/Side views are massively over-zoomed. Compute zoom from bounding box, set independent zoom per view mode. Fix reset button to actually work.

stories.title: Select any custom ryb in single ryb editor
stories.description: When multiple custom rybs exist, the single ryb editor should let the user pick which one to edit via tabs or a dropdown.

stories.title: Reset Ryb and Reset All Rybs buttons
stories.description: Add buttons to reset the current ryb to its default shape, and to reset all rybs to defaults.

stories.title: Standard shapes lost when switching from Freeform
stories.description: If the user draws freeform shapes then selects a standard shape (square/circle), the standard shape is lost. Fix shape persistence.

stories.title: Freeform editor click offset fix
stories.description: Users must click above points to select/drag them. Fix the Y-coordinate offset in the freeform canvas hit detection.

stories.title: Add/convert line and bezier segments in freeform editor
stories.description: Currently no way to create a new line or bezier segment or convert between types. Add create and convert controls.

stories.title: Default freeform shape more vertically aligned
stories.description: The initial freeform shape template should be taller/vertical (shelf-like) rather than wide/horizontal.

stories.title: Full Ryb Editor uses full vertical space
stories.description: The full ryb editor canvas only uses ~50% of the available vertical space. Make it expand to fill its container.

stories.title: Expand/collapse mode for both editors
stories.description: Both Single Ryb Editor and Full Ryb Editor should be expandable to a larger window for detailed work.

stories.title: Gimbal, pan, zoom controls in editor top-right
stories.description: Add tasteful orbit/pan/zoom control icons in the top-right of each editor canvas with hover highlights.

stories.title: Mobile layout improvements
stories.description: Mobile layout is broken — stack cards vertically, collapse controls, hide non-essential UI, make canvases full-width.

stories.title: Tablet layout improvements
stories.description: Tablet breakpoint needs intermediate layout — 2-column where possible, responsive canvas sizing.

stories.title: Test multi-ryb interpolation rendering
stories.description: Add Playwright tests that verify rendering produces visually distinct rybs when multiple custom rybs are defined with interpolation easing.

stories.title: Expand UI interaction tests
stories.description: Add comprehensive Playwright tests for view switching, slider interactions, shape preservation, freeform editing, and reset buttons.

stories.title: Implement SVG cut file export
stories.description: Generate a flat SVG file with all ryb profiles laid out for CNC cutting, including kerf compensation.

stories.title: Implement DXF cut file export
stories.description: Generate a DXF file from the same profile data used for SVG, for CAD/CNC software compatibility.
